Title: Averon Stormsire
Legend: A specialist in the sundering of dark enchantments, Knight-Incantor Stormsire is also acutely aware of the negative toll Reforging takes on a Stormcast’s soul, relentlessly searching for any form of cure in even the most hostile of locations.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Single, Unique. Averon Stormsire and Stormsire’s Cursebreakers must be taken as a set. Although taken as a set, each is a separate unit.

Intro: Averon Stormsire is armed with an Incantor’s Staff.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Lords of the Exemplar Chamber • Lords of the Harbinger Chamber • Lords of the Warrior Chamber

Rules.Name: Wizard
Rules.Rule: WIZARD: This unit can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the hero phase.

Rules.Name: Voidstorm Scroll
Rules.Fluff: Each Knight-Incantor bears a scroll infused with potent void magic.
Rules.Rule: Once per battle, in the enemy hero phase, when this unit attempts to unbind a spell, you can say that it is using its voidstorm scroll. If you do so, that spell is automatically unbound (do not make an unbinding roll).

Rules.Name: Stormsire
Rules.Fluff: Averon can summon forth a storm of eldritch lightning of unmatchable ferocity.
Rules.Rule: Stormsire is a spell that has a casting value of 7 and a range of 18". If successfully cast, each enemy unit within range suffers 1 mortal wound. Enemy units within 6" of the caster suffer D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
